title: Add moe.search_tasks MCP tool
description:
Add full-text search capability for tasks.

**Use cases:**
- Find tasks by keyword in title/description
- Filter by multiple criteria (status, epic, worker)

**Parameters:**
- query: string (searches title, description)
- filters: { status?, epicId?, assignedWorkerId? }
- limit: number (default 20)
